mapper.select: select chat_no from chat_group where member_nickname=#{memberNickname}
select member_nickname from chat_group where chat_no=#{chatNo}

SELECT c.chat_no, c.chat_title, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_group g2 WHERE g2.chat_no = c.chat_no) AS group_size, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_content cc WHERE cc.chat_no = c.chat_no AND cc.chat_content_no > COALESCE(( SELECT rs.chat_content_no FROM chat_read_status rs WHERE rs.chat_no = c.chat_no AND rs.member_nickname = '길우진' ), 0) ) AS not_read FROM chat c ORDER BY c.chat_no DESC
select member_nickname, chat_img,chat_content from chat_content where chat_no=#{chatNo}
